description:
flat_injected option is useful when network information like ip address is injected into vm to avoid dependency on dhcp server.  However, right now the flat_injected option has to be set in hypervisor level which means it has to be enabled/disabled to all instances in same nova compute. 

To provide more flexibility to allow user to choose using it or not when booting up a vm, it needs to support metadata based config like config_drive.
title: allow instance based flat_injected config
